data.name: The Parasites
data.detailed_description:
ADD TO WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1723610/The_Parasites/


About the Game

THE PARASITES is an open-world survival simulator set in an unexplored corner, after the fall of a giant meteorite.

You are one of those lucky enough to survive the infection. Every time you try to go beyond the catastrophe, you somehow come back. Your task is to survive and get out of this trap. As time goes by, loneliness and the itch of the parasite begins to put more and more pressure not only on your body, but also on your psyche – will you be able to survive in this unknown?

You don't get any help from the outside world. All you have is a parasite that you have learned to coexist with. By chance, he rewarded you with superhuman strength and survival. Using this, you will have to learn on the go, build shelters, improve your character, create traps, make tools and weapons for hunting and self-defense. Remember about those who are less fortunate, your life is under threat all the time: at any moment you can be killed.

Key Features



  • The environment and situations affect the psyche of the heroine
  • A unique damage system, be careful, the infected tear not only your flesh but also your clothes to shreds
  • Go in search of a robot loader, which will become an indispensable assistant for you in carrying heavy resources. Upgrade and repair it so that it will serve you to the end
  • The impact of environmental changes on the ecosystem
  • An easy-to-understand character skill system
  • Create items from improvised materials, dress the character according to the weather, so as not to get sick
  • Dangerous and nimble creatures, be ready to run or fight if you don't want to lose a part of yourself
  • Collect, grow food to keep your vital signs normal
  • Chop down trees, break stones to build a small shelter or an impregnable fortress
  • Unstable harsh climate, radiation spots after the disaster, be careful
  • Explore the open world with breathing flora and fauna, go down into the dark tunnels for the best equipment, just do not forget to take a light source with you




JOIN THE PARASITE COMMUNITY, WHERE YOU CAN LEARN A LOT MORE ABOUT THE PROJECT : Discord


REDUCE DEVELOPMENT TIME AND PARTICIPATE IN CLOSED TESTING BY JOINING MY GENEROUS PATRONS : Become a Patron!


FUNNY MOMENTS FROM THE DEVELOPMENT AND NOT ONLY ARE WAITING FOR YOU :
Tik Tok

data.short_description: You are one of those who managed to survive after the fall of a giant meteorite. Build, explore, survive, upgrade your character by fighting against parasites that have invaded the earth. And then you may be able to hold out for some more time.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese, Turkish, Swedish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-3570 / AMD FX-8350 Or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 2 GB or AMD Radeon™ HD 7970 Or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Attention, requirements may change during the development process!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 Or better
  • Memory: 14 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 590 Or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Attention, requirements may change during the development process!

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
